channel.title: Open Source on Anthea
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Anthea

item.title: The Seed Revolution: How Open-Source Genetics Unlock Vertical Farming's Potential
item.description: In the controlled, high-tech environment of a vertical farm, every variable is optimized for growthâ€”light, temperature, nutrients. But there’s one fundamental component that often remains locked in a proprietary system: the seed. Open-source seeds are emerging as a transformative force, poised to bridge this gap and create a more resilient, adaptable, and equitable foundation for the future of urban agriculture.
